ProfileName: Barbara Lundeen "there can't be enough books"
text: Starbucks VIA Ready Brew Coffee is the BEST instant coffee on the market and Amazon's "pack of 50" is a humungous good deal.  I don't use instant all the time but when I need to for convenience (in a hurry etc) VIA is the only coffee I've ever tried that hits the mark.  I was thrilled when I found VIA and I'm thrilled to be able to purchase it in bulk at a much lower cost.
